Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Bishop Ford, 115th, and Michigan due to street blockage at 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Kedzie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
